Posts.Title: 11years postmast./ now enlge lymphnode& nodule on breast GILMOURGIRL marie5890

Posts.Content: GILMOURGIRL wrote: hi all. im writing on behalf of my sister, who is 50 yrs old..had dcis twelve years ago. was diagnosed via mammogram..it was multifocal. sentinal node biopsy was negative. she is followed with mri / ultrasound and mammo. this past week she had the mri and it showed a 8 mm nodule in her remaining breast and an enlarged lymph node in the axillary/ armpit area also showing thickening in its cortex . she is to have biopsy on both lesions.. anyone have experience with enlarged lymph nodes showing on mri? and the outcome? thanks for any feedback. Posts.Content: Dec 13, 2011 04:35PM GILMOURGIRL wrote: hi all.. my sister got all biopsy results back today and thank god all is benign. she had a breast fibroadenoma and a reactive lymph node(probably due to some infection or virus). she is going to have another mri in six months... a big sigh of relief. thanks for being here !
